company_info.name: Stockton Walbeck

company_info.realistic_time_frame: Varies depending on the complexity of the course

company_info.traditional_way: Developing courses through trial and error
company_info.ideal_person: Someone with experience in course creation and marketing
company_info.painful_attempt: Trying to create and market a course without the right tools

target_audience.desires: To learn new skills, gain knowledge, become an expert in a particular subject and/or topic.
